mapper.select: SELECT attribute.id AS aid, attributedetail.id AS tid,detailname AS tname,attributename AS aname FROM attribute INNER JOIN attributedetail ON(attribute.id=attributedetail.attributeid) WHERE attributename='婚姻状况' and isvalid=1
